description: Gideon is back to take on Landon’s big dick! “I like all guys…but they definitely gotta have an amazing body like this guy, and gotta be carrying a good package.” Our newbie was all smiles…he knew what package was waiting for him to play with, and Landon was confident he could please his bottom through and through. “I’d like to believe that I can…and I will!”
title: Landon & Gideon: Bareback
